text: @realDonaldTrump This is so exciting! Make sure to print out extra Coronavirus waivers so attendees can’t sue the Trump Re-Election campaign if they get injured or sick. Like when restaurants have you sign a waiver so you can’t sue if you find a rat appendage or human finger in your soup. Enjoy! https://t.co/xabGjV6Sk9
